Class DAO_GameHistory

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class DAO_GameHistory
extends DAO_Base
    DAO for finished games data statistics saves. Created by Quentin on 03/02/2016.

    • Method Detail

      • save_game_metadata

        public void save_game_metadata()
        Saves the game's consistent data in the end of a game, like dead or not, paralyzed or not... Does not save action flags !

      • get_roles_list

        public android.database.Cursor get_roles_list()
        Gets a cursor with 2 attributes: the role's name and whether it is good or evil.
        Returns:
        Cursor with roles data.

      • get_games_list

        public android.database.Cursor get_games_list()
        Gets a cursor with 3 attributes: the games' keys, their timestamp and character count.
        Returns:
        Cursor with games data.

      • get_characters_list

        key - The game's key in table Game.
        Returns:
        Cursor with the game's character list and data.

        Reads the hist of the game pointed by the key.

        Returns:
        The game's hist as a String.
